item.title: Emotion
item.author: Author
item.description: Primary Emotions Happy Happiness is often defined as a pleasant emotional state that is characterized by feelings of contentment, joy, gratification, satisfaction, and well-being. Type Values Chances Facial Expressions Smiling Body Language Relaxed Stance Tone of Voice Upbeat Pleasant way of speaking Sad Sadness can be expressed in a number of ways including:
